title: First Guest Villain
author: JGray
text:
Guest Villain: Kietra

Hidden Name: JD Larson

Winged him.

Kludge lying to Baron Sir.

Don't get whiplash as we switch back and forth between the garage and the inn!

Kietra was one of two Kickstarter backers who paid to be a villain in this chapter. In this case, she picked being a sniper.

Anyone spot the Doctor Who reference on this page? Here's a hint. Last panel. And this time, it is not Baron Sir's uncanny resemblance to a certain Time Lord.

replies.author: Aleena*Guest*
replies.text: I actually thought, Grand Moff Tarkin to Princess Leia, but it turns out I was mistaken.

replies.author: Fairportfan*Guest*
replies.text: Looks more like asparagus.  I spotted it the other time you mentioned it, too.

replies.author: misa*Guest*
replies.text: Celery on the lapel, from the 5th Doctor?

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text: Looks like Kludge is going to have to reassemble Surgeon from scratch.

replies.author: Darlo*Guest*
replies.text: Trying to make that dream come true (only 27 more to go!)

replies.author: JD*Guest*
replies.text: They always said I'd be on radio some day...
